node.doctext:

Organizations

  • [http://www.perl.org|Perl.org]
  • [http://www.pm.org|PerlMongers]
  • [http://www.perlfoundation.org/|The Perl Foundation] (TPF)
  • [http://www.enlightenedperl.org/|The Enlightened Perl Organisation] - complementary to the Perl Foundation. "Supports certain Perl development efforts that ensure perl's future as an enterprise-grade development platform."
node.title: Perl People and Organizations
